1406940.name: Don't Crash - The Political Game Demo
1406940.description:
WARNING THIS GAME CRASHES WHEN YOU DIE! IT'S THE POINT OF THE GAME! (Or Demo)
Key Features:
1. Game Quits on Death
2. Sprite Ai
3. First Person Shooting
4. Four Weapons With More To Come
5. Political Humor
6. Consistent Updates With New Content
7. Consistent Bug Patches

Game includes features like shooting Trump 3d Sprites. FPS shooting, various guns, and avoiding possible traps. As well as some political humor along the way. This game is a work in progress.
I'm a solo Dev and I like it that way!
1406940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
